photosynthesis: Habka ay dhirtu u isticmaasho iftiinka qorraxda, biyaha, iyo CO2 si ay u soo saarto cunto (glucose)
Neefsashada gacanta: Habka ay unugyadu u burburiyaan gulukoosta si ay tamarta u sii daayaan
mitochondria: Unugyada ka masuulka ah neefsiga gacanta
chlorophyll: Midabka cagaaran ee dhirta ee nuugaya iftiinka qorraxda ee photosynthesis
dna: Deoxyribonucleic acid, molecule xanbaarsan macluumaadka hidaha
rna: Ribonucleic acid, molecule oo ku lug leh isku-darka borotiinka
borotiinka: Molecule oo ka kooban amino acids, oo qabta hawlo kala duwan oo jidhka ah
enzyme: Borotiinka soo dedejiya falcelinta kiimikaad ee jidhka
unugga: Unugga aasaasiga ah ee nolosha, aasaaska dhismaha noolaha oo dhan
nudaha: Koox unugyo isku mid ah oo wada shaqeynaya si ay u qabtaan hawl gaar ah
xubin: Koox unugyo ah oo wada shaqeynaya si ay u qabtaan hawl gaar ah
nidaamka xubnaha: Kooxda xubnaha ka wada shaqeeya si ay u qabtaan hawl adag
homeostasis: Awoodda noole si ay u ilaaliso deegaan gudaha ah oo deggan
la qabsiga: Isbeddel ku yimaadda noole ka caawiya inuu noolaado oo ku tarmo deegaankiisa
horumar: Habka ay dadka nooluhu isu beddelaan muddo ka dib
xulashada dabiiciga ah: Habka ay noolaha leh sifooyinka ku habboon deegaankooda ay u badan tahay inay sii noolaadaan oo ay taran karaan
deegaanka: Barashada sida ay nooluhu ula falgalaan midba midka kale iyo deegaankooda
nidaamka deegaanka: Bulshada noolaha iyo deegaankooda aan noolayn oo is dhexgalaya midba midka kale
biosphere: Qayb ka mid ah Dhulka oo taageera nolosha
taxonomy: Laanta bayoloji ee khusaysa kala soocida noolaha
morphology: Laanta bayoloji ee khusaysa daraasadda qaabka iyo qaab-dhismeedka
physiology: Qaybta bayoloji ee khusaysa daraasadda shaqada iyo hababka noolaha
autotroph: noolaha soo saari kara cuntadiisa isagoo isticmaalaya iftiin ama kiimikooyin (tusaale, dhirta)
heterotroph: Noolaha cuntada ku hela cunista noolaha kale (tusaale, xoolaha)
soo saare: Noolaha soo saara walxaha dabiiciga ah (tusaale, dhirta)
macaamiisha: Noolaha cuna walxaha dabiiciga ah ee ay soo saaraan noolaha kale (tusaale, xayawaanka)
wax dumiya: noole burburiya noolaha dhintay iyo walxaha organic (tusaale, fungi, bakteeriyada)
dadweynaha: Koox nooleyaal isku nooc ah oo ku nool meel gaar ah
bulshada: Koox ka kooban dadyow kala duwan oo isku falaya meel gaar ah
biome: Nidaam deegaan oo baaxad weyn leh oo leh dhir iyo xayawaan sifo ah (tusaale saxaraha, keymaha roobka)
noolaha: Nolasha kala duwan ee Dunida heer kasta, laga bilaabo hiddo-wadaha ilaa nidaamka deegaanka
halis galay: Noocyada halista ugu jira inay dabar go'aan
